name: run-create
title: Create Assistant Run
description: Start a new assistant run on a conversation thread to generate responses. This is the core operation that makes assistants process messages and generate replies. Use this after adding messages to a thread to get assistant responses. The run will process all messages in the thread and generate appropriate responses.

thread_id.description: The unique identifier of the thread to run the assistant on (format: "thread_abc123...").

assistant_id.description: The unique identifier of the assistant to use for the run (format: "asst_abc123...").

model.description: Override the model used by the assistant for this run (e.g., "gpt-4", "gpt-3.5-turbo"). Leave empty to use assistant's default model.

instructions.description: Override the instructions of the assistant for this run. Use to provide run-specific context or modify behavior.

additional_instructions.description: Additional instructions to append to the assistant's existing instructions for this run.

tools.description: Override the tools used by the assistant for this run. Replaces assistant's tools if specified.

examples.title: Start basic assistant run
examples.description: Run an assistant on a thread to generate responses

examples.title: Run with custom instructions
examples.description: Override assistant instructions for a specific run
